PersonalStatement.text: Kristen Wright, born on 1981-10-13, is a Male based in Swansonland, New Zealand. He is Divorced and holds Cameroonian nationality. Currently working at Hill, Delgado and Oneal.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Robertson Group from 2010 to 2016.
Senior Software Developer at Hill, Delgado and Oneal, 2021 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from University of South Florida
Master's in Engineering from Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys woodworking.
